[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (91.58 kb)

  
Report on the investigation of the collision between the German container ship Merkur and the United Kingdom fishing vessel Silvery Sea which then foundered about 35 miles west of Esbjerg, Denmark with the loss of five lives on 14 June 1998
